subject: Figure Skating
Olympic Games
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Ms. Scott was 19 when she became the first Canadian to win an Olympic gold medal in figure skating singles, in 1948 in St. Moritz, Switzerland, and she remains the only one.
snippet: Ms. Scott was 19 when she became the first Canadian to win an Olympic gold medal in figure skating singles, in 1948 in St. Moritz, Switzerland, and she remains the only one.
